title: Nutritional Implications of Food Industry Practices
description: Methods for assessing nutritional quality of foods/diets. Nutrient databases for raw and processed foods. Effects of food industry practices (e.g., processing, fortification, new product development, biotechnology) on nutritional quality of foods/diets. Evolution of public policy. 4 seminars.
prerequisites: FSN 210; FSN 125 or FSN 230; and junior standing
